Displays.Description:
A bullet bill shooter that will only shoot if the flag specified in the .asm file is clear. By setting the extra bit, this behavior will be inverted.
Extra Byte 1 controls the shooting direction and whether to shoot when the Mario is nearby horizontally. The valid values are:
00 = Shoot horizontally depending on Mario's position
02 = Shoot vertically depending on Mario's position.
04 = Always shoot up-right.
05 = Always shoot down-right
06 = Always shoot down-left.
07 = Always shoot up-left.
10 = Always shoot right.
11 = Always shoot left.
12 = Always shoot up.
13 = Always shoot down.
+80 = Adding this value to one of the previous will make the shooter ignore Mario's proximity.
Extra Byte 2 hijacks the timer between shots specified in the .asm file.

A bullet bill shooter that will only shoot if the flag specified in the .asm file is set. By clearing the extra bit, this behavior will be inverted.
Extra Byte 1 controls the shooting direction and whether to shoot when the Mario is nearby horizontally. The valid values are:
00 = Shoot horizontally depending on Mario's position
02 = Shoot vertically depending on Mario's position.
04 = Always shoot up-right.
05 = Always shoot down-right
06 = Always shoot down-left.
07 = Always shoot up-left.
10 = Always shoot right.
11 = Always shoot left.
12 = Always shoot up.
13 = Always shoot down.
+80 = Adding this value to one of the previous will make the shooter ignore Mario's proximity.
Extra Byte 2 hijacks the timer between shots specified in the .asm file.
